Header: DGGS Calls at 'Cormorant Strike' Operational Headquaters
Content: As the 'Cormorant Strike' - X entered to the 3rd day on Thursday (5), Major General A.M.R Dharmasiri, Director General General Staff (DGGS) at the Army Headquarters visited the Cormorant Strike Operational headquarters at Minneriya. Inside the operational headquarters, the visiting DGGS received a briefing on the sequence of mock exercises and other operational modalities. Brigadier Sujeewa Senarath Yapa, Exercise Deputy Director welcomed the DGGS. A few other senior officers were also associated with the occasion.
